snippet: Inventories rose more slowly in March than in previous months, but data suggested a steep downturn is unlikely.
abstract: Commerce Department reports wholesale stockpiles rose 0.3 percent in March from February, only one-third of the previous monthly increase; monthly sales rose 0.5 percent in March, about half the gain from the previous month.
lead_paragraph: Inventories rose more slowly in March than in previous months, but data suggested a steep downturn is unlikely.

headline.main: Wholesale Stockpiles Grow at Slower Rate as Sales Slip
headline.print_headline: Wholesale Stockpiles Grow At Slower Rate as Sales Slip
